articles.title: Forward Johnny Gaudreau joins Columbus Blue Jackets with seven-year deal, sources say
articles.description: Free-agent forward Johnny Gaudreau, the premier name in this year's NHL free-agent market and former Calgary Flames winger, has agreed to join the Columbus Blue Jackets, sources confirmed to ESPN Wednesday night.

articles.title: Gonzaga, Michigan State to play on USS Abraham Lincoln on Nov. 11
articles.description: Gonzaga and Michigan State will play on the flight deck of the USS Abraham Lincoln on Nov. 11 in the first aircraft carrier game in men's college basketball since 2012.

articles.title: Vegas Golden Knights create salary-cap space, ship star Max Pacioretty to Carolina Hurricanes, sources say
articles.description: The Vegas Golden Knights, looking to create some salary-cap room as free agency began around the NHL, traded star winger Max Paciorietty to the Carolina Hurricanes on Wednesday for future considerations.

articles.title: Oklahoma State football coach Mike Gundy asks why Texas, Oklahoma allowed in Big 12 business meetings

articles.title: Big E feeling 'grateful' in recovery from neck injury despite recent setback
